reviews.review:
Don't buy this game. 

The developers ruin it in small degrees with every patch they do. New bugs pop up, old bugs go unfixed. If a perk is unbalanced they rarely do any changes to it, they simply release new and increasingly overpowered perks so people no longer use the old previously unbalanced perks.

The latency in the game often makes playing as a survivor impossible, with killers hitting melee attacks from a dozen feet away. Being an asymetrical game with 1 killer versus 4 survivors, a lot of the power is naturally in the killers hands. So you can play for a whole evening and become the punching bag for frustrated kids that can't play the game normally.

The developers are completely deaf to feedback and make changes no one wants or asked for. The option to report players for toxic behavior or cheating etc, is a token act at best as nobody ever gets banned. Not even for cheating or hardcore griefing.

The game started out very promising, but now it's just another micro-transaction cashgrab for the developers. They make more new skins than actual changes to the game. Oh and many of the skins are bugged too!

I heard of it a while ago but forget about it again. Then a friend told me he would buy it. 
Bought it. Liked it immediatly.
Very dark and moody game that can send shivers down your spine. 

+ overall great atmosphere / feeling -
   from being the hunter, to beeing the hunted
   you can really feel the eyes of the killer on you, at all times, which is really cool
   (yeah you get kinda paranoid)
+ nice graphics - 
   maps are niceley designed and very moody 
+ cool soundtrack and good sound fx
+ upon release well balanced
+- hard to find a lobby which is due to the fact that (see below)

- no lobby making, to play with your friends 
   except a mode where you gather no XP

Definitely worth the money.
But judge for yourselfes 

Oh, and don't feel too safe. Just because you can't see them
it doesn't mean they can't see you.

Happy hunting and or dying. 
(I mean ... in the game, not in real life ... don't die, AND DON'T KILL ... you hear me?!)
Игра крутая и очень затягивает. Всем советую.

Really awesome game, especially when u get to know it! The maps changes often and it`s hard to navigate through it. I am not yet sur ehow the balance between the killers and te survivors are, but I have played the beta and with friends, its loads of fun!

Still no party lobby so you can only and i mean only play with friends unranked so if you have 1 or 2 friends on have fun. this game was rushed and its an utter mess, i already have had problems with the released game. Not a bad game for a couple of hours of fun but after that it gets dull and boring really fast.

Божешь ты мой, за что все восхваляют этот кусок кала?
Хм, с чего бы начать...
А начну я пожалуй с того, что местный геймплей уныл до ужаса. Нет, точнее не так. В первые игр 8 ты испытываешь хоть какие то эмоции, однако потом ты просто бежишь ремонтить генератор, а за ним второй и тд.
Стоит ли говорить о полезности большей части перков и шмоток? Сколько не свети блядским фонарем убийце в лицо, он все равно отлично где ты. Ммм, а перк на улучшение карты... Это просто шедевр.
Может быть вы хотите побегать от убийцы с другом? А хуй вам. Нормальный интерфейс? Хуй вам.
Ну, а еще убийца заметно быстрее жертвы, чтокакбэ намекает.
В итоге игра сводится к очень унылому ремонту генераторов. При этом, у вас времени ровно столько, сколько будут умирать 3 ваших товарища, ибо убийцы просто сторожат жертв.
Окончательный вердикт: 5/10, можно погонять вечерок.

Шикарный Экшен! Именно этой игры не хватало игровому сообществу. Сколько фильмо выходило за последние 30 лет жанра хоррор, и наконец мы получили достойную игру чтобы опробовать себя в роли жертвы или убийцы. 

p.s. тише тише.. он идет

Anyways I love the game so far and I hope it improves alot more since today is just day 1.

nice

The game was rushed and had many bugs in the beginning week. I was surprised, considering the alpha and beta tests they had prior to the full game's release. They also took some time to give the soundtrack and the artbook bonuses for the deluxe edition owners like me. 
When the game came out, I could either play with only me and my friend (1v1) or only play with others players. It felt strange that they didn't had the "Survive With Your Friends" mode from the beginning, again considering the alpha and beta tester's that asked for this feature from the beginning.
Now they added the "Survive With Your Friends" mode, which uses a lot of time to find a game and also makes you and your friends repeatedly press the "Ready" button until it finds a game. 
Okay, okay, new update! Yay! Now You get thrown out of the lobby 24/7. But at least you donæt press ready all the time, right?
I feel like developers are trying to stabalise ranks, but I still feel that the game is broken in many different ways.
My review may be negative, but it's still a good game. But there are just too many negative sides with it.

Highly recommend this game. Not only can most machines these days run it (minimum is a GTX 460) but it runs very well too. Dead By Daylight is a really nice take on the killer in a horror movie type of games. Right now it offers 3 killers and 12 maps in 4 styled areas. each map is randomly generated so it's never the same, you cant learn the layout as it's impossible.
The developers have stated that they plan to hand out alot of free DLC as well as paid dlc BUT HERE IS THE BEST PART!!!!!!!!!!!!! If you don't have the DLC do not worry, as long as someone in your lobby has it then you can play it. THEY ARENT SEPERATING THE PLAYERBASE! This is what we want in games these days. Nobody likes being seperated from the others because they arent willing to pay up. Each killer has their own special perks and traits. 1st: The Trapper. Brandishing a meat clever the trapper has the ability to place down rusty bear traps over the map. if someone steps in it then they must get help from a friend or try to take it off themselves. while in this state the trapper can pick them up and put them on a hook to sacrifice them. they can also be downed by being hit twice with the weapon. Then we have the 2nd: The Hillbilly. The hillbilly is based off the chainsaw massacre, he has a hammer similar to the trapper's clever but  he also has something else. his special ability is a chainsaw, the chainsaw is an instant down and when activated the hillbilly can only charge straight ahead but is lightning fast. it's truly terrifying in-game. 3rd: is my all time favorite, the wraith. the wraith is a very fucked up being. not only can the wraith go invisible but it does not trigger the action music when he is nearby so unless you manage to see him then you wont know. but to counter this survivors can listen for creepy bells to know when he is nearby. also his weapon is badass. Now the survivors i can't go into too much detail as i havent played them all but there are 4 survivors and each has a special ability/abilities aswell but you only gain access to as you level up. Some are good at running, helping others, distracting and more which is awesome. The game takes quite a while to get boring as you never know what you are against as survivors but you can also be the killer too and the randomly generated maps are a nice touch and it's VERY easy to get lost. It's filled with tense moments, should you go save your friend or run for the exit? Found a flashlight? (a flashlight is an item ingame you can find which if shined in the kilelrs face can blind and stun them) maybe you can distract the killer and have someone else unhook your friend! theres alot of choices and things to loom out for. I only briefed you on half of the things as i want to get back to playing the game but i hope i gave you a general idea of what the game is about.


Pros: Randomly generated maps, Teamwork, very fun and forces you to use your brain, not graphically intensive but still looks great, free content in the future and dlc that doesnt seperate the playerbase and more.

Cons: There have been reports of crashing but i personally haven't seen any with my experience in the BETA or the full game, No friend play against randoms only against other friends (But they will add this feature soon)
Awesome Game played the beta and now the full game and im loving it i highly recommend this game

Awesome evil fun, and a great new addition to the horror game genre. Highly recommended, especially if you bring friends along to hunt or try to survive with (though currently only able to do so in private matches, not ranked).

Pros: 
-Nice graphics
-Great atmosphere
-Lots to do as a Survivor
-Good music (at least initially, becomes repetitive after a few hours)
-Playing with friends (limited at the moment)
-Leveling/perks/etc. to broaden gameplay depth
-Consequences to failing as a Survivor (i.e. losing your equipped items)
-Randomly generated maps makes for much needed variability

Cons:
-Can't bring/invite your friends into public matches, only private games :(
-A bit buggy, as expected of a new release
-Limited players means rarely getting to play Killer in public games, unless you're REALLLLY patient waiting in queue
-Definitely tilted in favor of the Killer early on (before one can level up sufficiently), especially in public games with no way to coodinate amongst yourselves as Survivors resulting in mainly headless-chicken gameplay
-Losing your items as a consequence to getting matched with inept teammates
-Offerings (buffs to the match arena, earning of points, etc.) are consumed on use, including the rarer items
-Limited customization of characters
-Limited Killer characters (though this and the previous issue will likely be expanded upon in the near future)

Overall, a great exerience and will no doubt continue to improve as the devs address issues and expand on the game. And it's on sale til next month, so is definitely worth snagging now.

Its insanely fun for both casual and competitive players and always changes with multiple maps and map variants
If you choose to purchase this like i did Happy Hunting

Маньяк:
-Я должен убить их.Жертвоприношение было предрешено.Почему они не могут понять этого и пытаются упорно сбежать?Но зато так интереснее.Мышки загнанные в угол,пытающиеся сбежать.
-Как же меня радует их отчаянье,их страх.Их страх даёт мне ЖИЗНЬ.Я живу,я убиваю,я исполняю жертвоприношение.Цикл не остановить.Скоро они это поймут.И тогда их жизни придёт конец.Я буду идти за ними до конца.До ИХ КОНЦА.
Выжившие:
-Чёрт,чёрт,проклятье,он следует за нами.Он не отстаёт,он выжидает.Господи СПАСИ НАС!
-Как мы сюда попали?Что с нами будет?Когда это закончится?
-Чёрт,одного из наших...повесили на крюк?НА КРЮК???Что здесь происходит.Его нужно спасать...но...вдруг он и меня схватит?Что же делать....
-Это место угнетает,как будто сама смерть поселилась здесь и не хочет уходить....Не могу представить,кто станет делать такое с людьми....
-Генераторы,скорее чините генераторы,это наш единственный шанс выбраться от этого психопата.ЖИВЕЕ.
-Бегите,бегите что есть сил,у нас появился шанс....господи ОН УЖЕ ИДЕТ СЮДА.
И у этой истории есть 2 конца:
-НЕУЖЕЛИ НАМ УДАЛОСЬ СБЕЖАТЬ?!Господи,слава богу,неужели этот кошмар закончился,неужели мы можем не бояться смерти каждую минуту?Я так рад,так рад!!!

-Меня ПОЙМАЛИ....черт НЕЕЕТ....Я ДОЛЖЕН ПОПЫТАТЬСЯ ВЫБРАТЬСЯ....только не крюк...НЕЕЕЕЕТ....ААГГХ....
-Неужели это конец....черт....не долго мне осталось...надеюсь я прожил свою жизнь не зря....неужели это и в правду конец?.................

Так вот игра об 4 выживших и 1(из 3 на выбор)маньяков.Выжившие в страхе должны починить генераторы,открыть дверь на выход и сбежать.Маньяк же должен убить их всех,но не просто убить,а принести в жертву,повесив на крюк.При этом выжившие будут отчаянно пытаться не дать вам их принести в жертву.
Из гемплея можно отметить мини проверки в виде ползунка,который идёт по круговой линии и небольшой зоны,в которой нужно нажать кнопку(пробел).Если нажал правильно-ускорил починку,нажал не правильно-остановил починку ещё и немного подорвал генератор и привлек внимание маньяка небольшим взрывом.
Есть 3 вида маньяка-1 с капканами,2 с инвизом,3 с бензопилой.
Помогать,как маньяку,так и выжившему будут перки,такие как например ускорение у выжившего или устрашение у маньяка и у выжившего ещё есть предметы.Например аптечка-можно лечить себя и других быстрее или ремонтный набор-позволяет ломать крюки и чинить генераторы быстрее.(у маньяка,как и у выжившего,есть ещё дополнительные предметы,которые немного меняют в ту или иную пользу,например на карте будет на 1 крюк меньше и всё в таком духе)
Аудио очень понравилось.Все звуки и вся музыка так или иначе держит в напряжении за выжившего и заставляет предвкушать страдания жертвы за маньяка.
Графика тоже не подкачала,красиво выглядит.
Гемплей понятное дело хорош,мы ради в него играем в эту игру)
Ставлю оценку 10 жертвоприношений богу крови из 10.
Советую купить и поиграть в неё,не пожалеете.

UPDATED AS OF 6/11/17!!!Review: Dead by daylight is a multiplayer asymetrical horror game where there are 4 survivors versus 1 killer. The survivors have a 3rd person camera while the killer has a 1st person camera. The main goal of the game for survivors is to activate 5 generators and find the 2 escape doors, there is also a trap door you can use if you find it and the key. Another way to use the trap door is if you are the last person alive it will automatically open. The killer's goal is to find and kill all survivors by sacrificing them to the "entity" by putting them on meat hooks. 
Honestly one of the best games Ive played in a while. I'll list some pros  and cons.

Pros: Great graphics and easy to learn 
Not too scary for the younger ones who want to play
Good mechanics and map design
Good player progression


Cons: This is a pro an con, you can now play with friends for BP, but its only surviving, not killing.
No in game voice chat
Cant change controls
Basic graphics changing (although I dont worry about it some others will) 
Few bugs here and there, and few crashes.
 
Conclusion: Honestly for the game to have just come out its in great shape, of course the game is going to have its bugs and crashes when it releases and getting mad isnt going to help. Give the developers some constructive feedback, not feedback of you cursing and going off. I do wish that im able to play with friends in a ranked/multiplayer match and still earn BP but i hear they are working on it, so im not sure. I wish I could edit my controls but thats honestly not a big problem, for now i feel the 12 maps and 3 locations will do but of course there will be more. After a year of playing here and there, I believe the game is at a very playable state, I havent encountered any bugs lately,and I am having alot of fun surviving with friends. Overall I would give this game a.... 8.5/10
Epic good horor. 10/10
I got killed first my first match, exactly how I expect it to happen in RL.
is geil kann man sich geben
Game makes hella fun, its just missing a party system!

Eines der schlimmesten Entwicklerteams, welches derzeit auf dem Markt für Computerspiele existiert. Das Spiel an sich ist ganz ok, wenn man vom dem ingame-store und der dreisten DLC-Politik mal absieht. Was ich dennoch absolut nicht gerechtfertigt finde ist, dass dieses schamlose und widerliche Entwicklerteam, Spielern einen Ban auf ihren Steamprofil reindrückt, nur weil sie sich mal ein achievement mit einem tool freigeschalten haben. Wem intressiert es, ob sie das gemacht haben?! Es stört doch absolut niemanden?!

Des Weiteren geht es damit weiter, dass man sogar für das Verlassen eines Spiels gebant werden kann.... Manche Entwickler würden wirklich gerne die neue Internetpolizei sein.
Great game

I love this game, but limiting people to ether play solo or with friends that bought this game and have to join a certain time to play it's gonna kill this game.. I spent 30minutes trying to join my friends lobby.. Just to play one mach and when we finally did killer left O_O Good game but You are slowly killing it :(

Чёрт, это шикарно! Очень атмосферно, захватывающе; эти неожиданные повороты в игровом процессе, страх, который порой нахлынывает на тебя, довольное лицо жертвы, когда удаётся удрать от маньяка или счастливый маньяк насаживающий жертву на крюк,..
Игра произвела на меня положительные впечатления. Прекрасная задумка и отличная реализация.  :) Надеюсь разработчики и дальше будут нас радовать интересными и будораживающими нововведениями. 
10 хрюкающих поросят из 10.
Best lobby find simulator 2016 11/10

Игра - где куча нытиков и аморальных уродов.
- Ты не кемперишь, убил всех - ноют.
- Ты не кемперишь, убежали все - лол изи ахахха (хотя я специально тебя и отпустил, полоумный ты ...). 
- Ты не кемперишь - ты кемпер. Вот это вообще супер! XD
- Ты не кемпиришь, убежали 2 сурва - ноют те кто не сбежал. "Как ты меня нашел?! Репорт, сцука!!!"
- Ты не кемпиришь, убил троих. Последнего поймал у люка - "Ты такой сякой, мог бы дать сбежать".

Отсюда вывод - сурвам не нужны адекватные убийцы. Вешайте их, кемперите, фейскемперите, бодиблочте этих вечных нытиков и пишите им "изи, лол, ахахах" ибо заслужили такое к себе отношение.

Игра не смотря на все баги с каждым обновлением, не смотря что прошел 1 год как вышла игра, всё ещё интересна. Каждая катка - история выживания или история твоей смерти.

P.S. Маньяки - играйте как войны, не кемперите и не бодиблочте! Сурвы - играйте без танцев а-ля казачок и перестаньте писать всякую дичь.
Уважайте друг друга!!! =)

[b][Caso encontre algum erro, por favor seja educado e avise pelo comentário][/b]

[h1]"Death Is Not an Escape"[/h1]
[h1]"Scooby Doo, cadê você?"[/h1]
[h1]"Hey, hey, hey, stay out of my shed..."[/h1]

[h1]Dead by Daylight:[/h1]
[strike](Morto pela luz do dia)[/strike]
É um jogo de [u]Serial Killer Vs Sobreviventes[/u] e [u]Primeira ou Terceira Pessoa[/u], dependendo de qual lado está jogando.
No jogo não existe nenhum meio de comunicação, seja ela escrita ou voz, deixando o jogo mais aterrorizante [strike]e não tem como joga com os amigos no server publico, mas isso não é totalmente ruim, isso evita [i]Ghosting[/i] (conhecido como Skype ou Teamspeak).[/strike]

[b]OBS.:[/b] O jogo esta com 10% desconto para quem possui o [b]PAYDAY 2[/b]

[h1]Deluxe Edition:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Soundtrack
[*]Art Book
[*]2 Mascara para o [b]PAYDAY 2[/b]
[*][strike]3 Chava para o beta[/strike]
[/list]

[h1]Como funciona:[/h1]
[b]Serial Killer:[/b]
[list]
[*]Primeira Pessoa
[*]Procure por sobreviventes e não tenha misericórdia
[/list]

[b]Sobreviventes:[/b]
[list]
[*]Terceira Pessoa
[*]Fuja do Serial Killer fazendo Stealth
[*]Trabalho em equipe
[*]Faça os objetivos e escape
[/list]

[h1]Possui:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Trading Card
[*]Compatível com controle
[*]Multiplayer (4 Vs 1)
[*]Tradução PT-BR
[*]Ranked ou privado
[/list]

[h1]Positivo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Inovador
[*]Divertido
[*]Aterrorizante
[*]É possivel joga com os amigos
[*][strike]Nao tem como fazer [i]ghosting[/i][/strike] [b]Surviver with your friends[/b]

O jogo é incrível, tem uma atmosfera de terror (apesar de se acostumar com o tempo) a mecânica funciona e o jogo é ótimo.
A parte competitiva torna o jogo viciante, recomendaria se fosse 60 reais e recomendo fortemente por 30!

E por favor, se você tiver uma conexão ruim/fraca/lenta, NÃO SEJA O KILLER.
O killer é o host da partida.
Se você está em uma partida lagada.. é o killer que tem a internet ruim.

Even though I don't have much time in the game, the game was release today and I played some beta and watched a ton of streams. The game is great, playing with both survivor and killer is A LOT of fun. Honestly, the only bad things I can point out are:
-No party matchmaking YET (The devs have said that that is the NUMBER ONE priority. If that's a dealbreaker to you, wait around for some days and then buy the game)
-No keybindings config (I have no trouble with it, but it is important)
-Wraith bugged RIGHT NOW (With a hot fix, that is gone aswell)
So basically, lots of people have been being really harsh on the game, but I still recommend it A LOT. If any of this reasons is enough for you to not buy the game, wait around, and they will be fixed. Hope I can murder you in the game sometime :P

10/10, наконец-то хорошая игра не за 1999 рублей, как это стало модно.

Эх, а ведь так хорошо было в пятнице, где НЕ БЫЛО подобных обвинений в сторону нашего клуба крутых убийц. Каждый раз, после игры в эту прекрасную игру ДБД, мне очень больно... Меня избивают палетками, и выжигают мои нежные глазки фонарем.... Пожалуйста помогите мне денюшкой на лечение .... Мне очень плохо
Cool. Fun. Addictive. Scary.

Отличная игра!
Изначально отноился к ней с некоторой долей скептицизма, и уж тем более сомневался после внутриигрового туториала, в котором лагали персонажи из-за пинга. Но сразу же, после нескольких минут я сразу же изменил свое мнение.
Атмосфера и адреналин тут буквально на каждом шагу. Действительно страшно прятаться выжившим от убийцы.
Самый лучший вариант, прятаться в траве и ни в коем случае не бегать, потому что от спринта на земле остается рваная красная дорожка, видимая только убийцей и являющаяся для него ориентиром.
К слову об убийцах. Их тут не так уж и много, но зато каждый из них уникальный. Классический, в маске с острыми зубами (еще из BETA-версии) правда достаточно похож на всем известного убийцу с Хрустального Озера, но вот его манера движения, оружие и стиль убийств разительно отличаются.
Карты всего три, но на каждой несколько процедурно генерируемых локаций, что очень сильн разнообразит игровой процесс.
Оптимизация нормальная, ничего не проседает и не лагает.
Из минусов можно выделить посредственную систему коннекта к серверам и постоянно сливающихся из игровой сессии напарников, из-за которых матч очень долго стартует.
В остальном же - неожиданный эпик и однозначно классная игра.

Great Game

[h1]Updated 29/8/16[/h1]
Note: I've stopped updating this guide because the developers haven't made a decent patch yet.

It’s now been a handful of months since the release date of DBD and when I made my first review of this game.
It’s gotten marginally better, but overall little has changed.

[b]1)	Matchmaking[/b]
Matchmaking is looking worse every update. Each patch the developers seem to break or cripple matchmaking times for a day or two before fixing it. Furthermore, there is still no evidence of a calculation done for players when they match-make, meaning a totally new player can get matched to a very experienced set of player(s) that will make short work of them as a new player.
An example from a match I just had;
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=752856827

Lots of new players find this very frustrating to be outmatched and outgunned so heavily. And from an experienced player side, it makes games very boring and grinding.
And yes, the game is still P2P hosted so the killer has a big network advantage on you if he decides to plug his 200m Ethernet cable into their neighbour’s modem. That is all assuming that you actually find a match. I’ve been waiting in lobbies for 20 minutes with over 18K people online.

[b]2)	Balance[/b]
In terms of matchmaking, little is being done about the overall balance of gameplay and how each side reacts to each other’s decisions. There is still a lack of a push or pull mechanic, meaning that games are over very quickly or very slowly depending on who has the better perks.
The developers seem to favour the killer over the survivors; every update the killer gets noticeable buffs while the survivors get nerfs or nothing at all. 

Last update the killer even got an auto aim feature for the lunge attack, meaning you could lunge at a survivor as they turned a corner and majestically ballroom dance your way round the corner while lunging to hit them. This makes games very unfair for the survivor.

There are maps themed around each killer, the problem is that some killers are very useless on specific maps, maps you have very little control over playing. This leads to very biased games which can be a stomp or very frustrating.

[b]3)	Progression[/b]
Progression is getting more and more tiresome each update. The progression tree is randomly generated, which means you can get very lucky and get one of the most overpowered perks in the game early or get completely screwing and get one of the many broken or dysfunctional perks that still aren’t fixed.

If you love grinding games, DBD is very much for you. Your rank will be reset every month as standard and the skill tree is full of clutter and fluff to bulk out levelling. You will get 1 perk per level on your tree but the rest of your tree will be add-ons and other consumables that will buff you. 
The problem is you lose these after every game so the skill tree is flooded with useless consumables you need to buy before you get to your perk or more useful items.
This means you could spend almost triple the value of the perk you want just buying the 3 or 4 add-ons to get there. This would be fine if the add-ons were useful. But many are not.
Firstly the descriptions of the items are frustratingly vague.

[i]“Slightly increases the chance of being sent to Autohaven wreckers when used”[/i]
Well what is this “slightly” you speak of? Is that 1%? 10%? 40%? More? Less?
You can possibly find these figures on the wiki (if they are correct), but if they are on the wiki, is it really so hard to put them into the item description? The answer is “no, it isn’t”. It is just lazy not to do so.

Furthermore, the value of perks seems to be all over the place.
For this example, let’s say perk A is worth 3000 points, it sits right at the start of the skill web.
But then, slightly further out, you see exactly the same perk, but it’s worth 5000 points this time.

What gives? It just seems like a ploy to get you to throw away more of your hard earned points to string out the progression more. The game lacks so much content at the moment that makes progression tedious in order to make the illusion that it’s much more than what it is.

[b]4)	Overall quality[/b]
The main cause of all these problems is mainly the developer’s choices. Update notes are very unhelpful containing phrases as vague as the add-on descriptions. 

“Adjusted the catch-up speed for the Nurse” – no reference to what this means, just a single sentence that really isn’t helpful. 

There are plenty of other examples where the update notes are just “increased” or “decreased”. If the developers are trying to make this game some sort of e-spot like they so badly are, they really need to put more effort into their update notes.

And yet, game breaking bugs like getting stuck in objects will still get you
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=752822872

The developers also have a habit of addressing the symptoms of a problem and not the disease, often completely missing the problem people have been complaining about and change something related to it instead. 

Like the way map exploits created safe zones for survivors, so the developers made the killer’s lunge much longer and let the non-abusers have a miserable time trying to escape an impossibly long lunge, rather than just boarding up the exploits or changing map design.

Another example is how they nerfed many of the reward values for performing actions, then they threaten players that farm points with permament bans. Even though in some games players get barely enough to rank up due to the nerfs.

This game also has an anticheat, but it commonly bans people for no reason and still allows cheaters into games.

[h1]Conclusion;[/h1]
This game should really still be in early access.
The developers clearly have no idea what they are doing, the game is progressively getting worse and more and more people are not playing each month. It has barely improved but has a very long way to go before it will be playable.

By the time it gets to be playable, the community will be so small that matchmaking times will be long enough to make people quit. 
Proof of decline: http://steamcharts.com/app/381210
Friday the 13th is on the horizon, and that will most likely blow this shit-show out of the water.

The community is also pretty unbearable and technical support is borderline non-existant and the forum page for it is a graveyard of bugs going back to the beta that are still not solved.

[h1]Save your money and avoid.[/h1]

Overall, the gameplay is fun and immersive, and if you are looking for a great survival horror game with 4-5 friends then I'd highly recommend playing this game.  However, currently it is missing some core features, in particular the option for Key Bindings and Queuing with Friends.

Pros:
Good Graphics
Interesting Gameplay
Immersive and exciting
Nice range of items and perks

Cons:
No public party option
Lack of key binding options
Some bugs such as lobby failures occur

I played the game for a little over 25 hours while it was in beta and had a blast doing so. There were a few bugs here and there but nothing that was really game breaking (Minus the 8+ man lobbies that sometimes would happen) and nothing I didn't assume would be fixed upon launch. One of the things I enjoyed most during the beta was playing with my friends, which took forever to acctually set up due to the fact there isn't a ranked mode where you can que with a party, so instead we had to just keep looking until after sometimes 45 minutes, we found each other. The devs talked about working on party mode and that it would hopefully be out by release. Come release day and you are still unable to party up with friends. In addition there are a whole bunch of game breaking bugs now. In my opinion, this game was NOT ready for launch and should've instead been left as an early access game, where they would've had more time squash bugs and listen to community feedback, seeing as the few weeks they had in beta wasn't enough time to let them address all the issues. 

TLDR:
Can't currently play ranked with friends
Many bugs
Still feels like a beta

Would still recommend if you are will to wait for the updates that will improve the game, otherwise, save your money and wait for a full release in 5-8 months.
